articles.title: Apple Eyes Fees as It Readies for Europe's Digital Markets Act - PYMNTS.com
articles.description: March looms as a deadline for platforms to be in full compliance with Europe’s Digital Markets Act. Will Big Tech examine new monetization opportunities?
articles.content:
For Apple, the opening of the ecosystem proceeds apace in Europe.
With it, however, comes the potential to realize some additional revenue streams.
And what happens in Europe, with Apple at the epi… [+2895 chars]

articles.title: What You Need To Know About Measles After WHO Sounds Alarm Over Killer Virus In Europe - Forbes
articles.description: There was a 45 fold increase in measles infections in Europe last year, the WHO said.
articles.content: Health officials around the world are scrambling to combat a rising tide of measles as falling vaccination rates and increased travel after the Covid-19 pandemic help the dangerous virus stage an ala… [+4569 chars]
